metadata.title: CVE-2024-9387 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 11.8before 17.4.6, 17.5 before 17.5.4, and 17.6 before 17.6.2. An attackercould potentially perform an open redirect against a given releases APIendpoint.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
